visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color for the title, axis labels, and tick marks, with a font size of 14px for the title and 12px for the axis labels, Data series: Provide the data for a single series named 'Temperature' with the given monthly average temperatures, Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the series, Additional configurations: Set the chart margins to 50px on all sides, add a light gray background to the chart, and include a legend with the series name.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the title is styled with a dark blue color and a font size of 14px. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with the same dark blue color and a font size of 12px. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis title indicates the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series named 'Temperature' contains the monthly average temperatures, and the series color is a gradient from light blue to dark blue. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins to 50px on all sides, adding a light gray background, and enabling the legend to display the series name.
